text:
The Ant manual, Optional Taks, Microsoft Visual SourceSafe Tasks User Manual, 
uses "srssafe.ini" name to reference:

"serverPath - directory where srssafe.ini resides"

The file name is wrong, the correct one is "srcsafe.ini".
creator: alberto@gamepro.es
kajsa@usfamily.net
text:
In the vssget section explanation of serverPath, "directory where ss.ini
resides" should be "directory where srcsafe.ini resides".

In all the other sections, the description of serverPath contains the typo
reported by the original reporter.
